Episodes.Title: Snowy Story
Episodes.Plot: In the Arctic Circle three explorers realise they can solve their problems by sharing their supplies.

Episodes.Title: Neptune's Visit
Episodes.Plot: A little mermaid is feeling down in the dumps until she discovers she has a special talent all of her own.

Episodes.Title: Make Me a Rainbow
Episodes.Plot: A poor, generous fisherman finds a pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.

Episodes.Title: Frown Town
Episodes.Plot: When a clown appears in Frown Town he shows the locals how to have fun. It's not long before Frown Town becomes Clown Town!
